dict.string: Honua Field needs access to your location to collect geospatial data and track GPS trails while using the app.
Honua Field needs access to your location to collect geospatial data even when the app is in the background.
Honua Field needs access to your location to collect geospatial data and track GPS trails.
Honua Field needs precise location for accurate geospatial data collection.
Honua Field needs access to your camera to capture photos and videos for documenting field observations.
Honua Field needs access to your microphone to record audio notes and video with sound.
Honua Field needs access to your photo library to select and attach photos to your field observations.
Honua Field needs permission to save photos to your photo library.
